metadata.title: CVE-2019-13618 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In GPAC before 0.8.0, isomedia/isom_read.c in libgpac.a has a heap-basedbuffer over-read, as demonstrated by a crash in gf_m2ts_sync inmedia_tools/mpegts.c.

criterions.comment: gpac: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
